text:
That game we played the
other day was so fun!
My heart pounded
real hard! Exciting!
Here's the fruit prize
I couldn't get to you!

I've sent the prize from the game
we played the other day! You
looked real smart when you were
playing! I'm still tingling! Let's play
again—it was so much fun!

Did you enjoy our game the other
day? Here are the fruits I couldn't
hand to you last time. I almost
snuck a bite because they looked
so good! I didn't. But I almost did.
